entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Goodnotes 6
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$10.99 ‚Üí $1.99

Application Description

Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6. With leading AI technology and advanced digital tools, Goodnotes is your go-to note-taking app for capturing ideas, organizing documents, sharing notes, and collaborating with others. Empowering Students to Excel ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to get answers to any questions about the information in your notes, generate practice quizzes, and more using AI ‚Ä¢ Solve handwritten math problems anywhere in your notes with Math Assist, simply by tapping the equals sign ‚Ä¢ Convert your handwritten math equations to LaTeX format ‚Ä¢ Memorize vocabulary, or information from your handwritten notes with Study Sets ‚Ä¢ Fix grammar, paraphrase, change length or tone of your text with the the help of AI Typing ‚Ä¢ Work on the same document with your classmates in your next seminar or project ‚Ä¢ Record audio from your lectures in sync with your handwriting ‚Ä¢ Find previous notes in a blink with handwriting search Enhancing Planners‚Äô Creativity ‚Ä¢ Customize the size, color, or cover of your notebooks and paper templates ‚Ä¢ Edit, resize, and align your handwriting just like typed text, and watch it reflow to fill the spaces ‚Ä¢ Improve your concentration and productivity with Smart Timer ‚Ä¢ Download cute stickers, stylish templates, useful paper templates, even educational material from the in-app Marketplace ‚Ä¢ Unlimited customizable folders for organizing your notes ‚Ä¢ Bonus downloadable content in Marketplace for paid users every month ‚Ä¢ Pencil, tape, eyedropper, elements, lasso tool, crop images, layering, and many more useful features to help you create beautiful notes Boost Professionals‚Äô Productivity ‚Ä¢ Project documents easily from your device and guide your audience with a built-in laser pointer ‚Ä¢ Import meeting notes, contracts, photos, presentations, or briefs for signature, annotation or collaboration ‚Ä¢ Export your notes to email, print, or share them anywhere as PDF or image ‚Ä¢ Add documents by directly sending it to your unique Goodnotes email ‚Ä¢ Secure the safety of your important documents with iCloud Sync, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

Application Description

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put it‚Äù! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

entry.title: Notes Writer Pro 2025
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Notes Writer Pro AI AssistantÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99

Application Description

You have lecture notes to take, a story to tell, article to publish, whether it‚Äôs today‚Äôs journal entry, tomorrow‚Äôs thesis, highlight important things in ebooks and PDFs, fill out a PDF form or get the most from your business meetings. Notes Writer is an excellent assistant in study and business, also being effective for writing down your ideas and thoughts and sharing them! Students, teachers, writers, doctors, journalists, scholars and business professionals use Notes Writer daily to store notes, annotations, memos, signed PDFs, papers, highlighted PDF text-books, lectures and more. With Notes Writer Pro you can: + WRITE. EDIT. FORMAT ¬∑ Write Everywhere: Use Notes Writer as an stand-alone writing app even if you don‚Äôt have a computer or you are offline in the wilds ¬∑ Create rich text format (RTF) and advanced Markdown (MD) documents ¬∑ Define margins, headers/footers, paper sizes, MLA and APA style format ¬∑ Live counters: characters, words, sentences, lines, Avg. Word length, Words per sentence & reading time ¬∑ Text to Speech for proofreading ¬∑ Dictation lets you speak text instead of typing ¬∑ Typewriter: Distraction-Free mode, letting you focus on what you‚Äôre writing ¬∑ Over 30 languages typing support including Japanese, Chinese, Arabic & Hebrew ¬∑ Extra keys: tab, forward delete, cursor up/down/left/right, etc. + ANNOTATE PDFs. FILL FORMS. SIGN DOCUMENTS. ¬∑ PDF Annotations: highlight, strikeout, underline, notes, voice notes, pencil, stamp, sign... ¬∑ Fill out forms. Supports PDF AcroForms standard ¬∑ Sign with your own signature documents, contracts, forms ¬∑ Digital Signature Validation + ORGANIZE. STRUCTURE. FIND. ¬∑ Organize your work in unlimited notebooks, folders and subfolders ¬∑ Create notebooks and projects in your own tree-like structure: Sections, Classes, Lectures, Grades, Drafts, Folders, Chapters, Research, etc. ¬∑ Design the cover of your notebooks ¬∑ Full-text search your library of documents and projects + SCAN NOTES. RESEARCH. PDF LIBRARY ¬∑ Split view: Open two PDFs or handwritten notes simultaneously on screen. Compare or use them as book and paper ¬∑ Full PDF reader and manager included for reference files, text books, ebooks, articles, resources, papers, etc. ¬∑ Use the camera of your iPad/iPhone to scan documents, notes, recipes, tickets, etc. as PDF ¬∑ Open PowerPoint, Word and Excel files + SHARE NOTES. EXPORT PDF, HTML‚Ä¶ ¬∑ Open attachments directly from the Mail app ¬∑ Sync via iCloud, Dropbox, Box, WebDAV and Google Drive ¬∑ Convert to multiple formats RTF, Markdown, PDF, ePub, HTML, RTFD, TXT, etc. ¬∑ Zip folders/notebooks and email them + AUTOMATIC BACKUPS. BE SAFE. PROTECT YOUR WORK ¬∑ Protect your work with an app security passcode ¬∑ Protect any folder or project with a passcode ¬∑ Automatic Backups of your notes and notebooks Notes Writer is more than an innovative, fast and reliable note-taking, PDF annotator and writing app designed for anyone who take notes or writes. This is a smart notepad and writing workspace for your iPad and iPhone. Privacy Policy http://www.noteswriter.com/Kairoos_Privacy_Policy.html EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: RAIN RADAR ¬∞- sky weather NOAA
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$12.99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Weather radar in your pocket everywhere. Use Rain Radar to quickly see an animated radar image and current conditions. Track the movement of downpours, weather fronts and storms using the zoomable rain radar function. ‚ÄúRain Radar" forecasts for any location worldwide and displays real-time weather conditions as well as emerging patterns. Everything about the weather at a glance. Fast, simple and free of charge! A weather forecast app that accurately depicts current weather and emerging patterns.
